execution_summary: Docker image built with Python 3.10-slim and required libraries. Updated analysis script to reference mounted data path dynamically. Executed mixed-effects model on 5% ESS Round 5 sample, obtaining positive and significant coefficient for immigration concern, in line with preregistered hypothesis.

code_executed.logs: Loaded 1279 rows, after NA drop 858. Imm_concern coef 0.214 (SE 0.039, p<0.001). Convergence warnings issued but run completed.
code_executed.environment: Python 3.10 with pandas 1.4, numpy 1.22, statsmodels 0.14, pyreadr 0.4.7 inside Debian slim container

results.hypothesis_tested: Higher immigration concern will be associated with higher distrust in the national parliament.

tables.table_description: CSV of fixed-effect estimates saved by script.
